## IResultEvent.coordinates property

Array of 21 \[x, y\] coordinates where x and y are relative coordinates such that \[x,y\] = \[0,0\] corresponds to the top left pixel of the track source and \[x,y\] = \[1,1\] corresponds to the bottom right pixel of the track source.

The array is orderd as follows: <ul> <li> \[0-3\]: Thumb from base to tip.<br> </li> <li> \[4-7\]: Index finger from base to tip.<br> </li> <li> \[8-11\]: Middle finger from base to tip.<br> </li> <li> \[12-15\]: Ring finger from base to tip.<br> </li> <li> \[16-19\]: Little finger from base to tip.<br> </li> <li> \[20\]: Base of hand.<br> </li> </ul>

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
coordinates: number[][];
```
